sentence: Mandel also called out anti-Trump Republican Reps. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Adam Kinzinger of Illinois, as well as Sen. Mitt Romney, R-Utah, saying: "we need to do everything we can to eliminate them from the Republican Party and from politics."
author: Tyler Olson
title: With Cruz backing, Mandel brushes off RINO' attacks after book alleges dishonesty
